mapper.insert: insert into TB_MS_INFO( udn, online_status, status, type, is_tcn, is_sub_group, is_sub_register) values( #{udn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{onlineStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isTcn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isSubGroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isSubRegister,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update:
update TB_MS_INFO
online_status = #{onlineStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
imsi = #{imsi,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_tcn = #{isTCN,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_sub_group = #{isSubGroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_sub_register = #{isSubRegister,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where udn = #{udn}
mapper.select: select m.UDN, m.ONLINE_STATUS, m.`STATUS`, m.IMSI,m.TYPE, m.IS_TCN, m.IS_SUB_GROUP, m.IS_SUB_REGISTER from TB_MS_INFO m where m.UDN= #{udn}

select g.GRP_NAME, m.UDN, u.USER_NAME, m.ONLINE_STATUS, m.`STATUS`, m.IMSI,m.TYPE, m.IS_TCN, um.IS_SUB_GROUP, um.IS_SUB_REGISTER, um.IS_SUB_CALL from TB_MS_INFO m inner join TB_GROUP_MS gm on gm.UDN = m.UDN inner join TB_USER u on u.UDN = m.UDN inner join TB_GROUP_INFO g on g.GRP_ID = gm.GRP_ID left join TB_USER_MS_SUB um on um.UDN=m.UDN
limit ${(pageNow-1)*pageSize}, #{pageSize}

select count(1) from TB_MS_INFO m inner join TB_GROUP_MS gm on gm.UDN = m.UDN inner join TB_USER u on u.UDN = m.UDN inner join TB_GROUP_INFO g on g.GRP_ID = gm.GRP_ID left join TB_USER_MS_SUB um on um.UDN=m.UDN
